channel.title: Need help keep getting Connection error
channel.description:
Okay, im using SoulSplits source works fine.. Then im opening up my client, and it happens, it tells me " Connection Error retrying in 5 seconds".. And i ran another client, i could login but i disconnect, because its not the correct client. Because the source need a special client.. So its the client somethings wrong with
Any help will be please :)

item.title: Need help keep getting Connection error
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:2, topic:348564”][quote author=matiasmunk link=topic=444943.msg3267035#msg3267035 date=1278942068]
Okay, im using SoulSplits source works fine…
Then im opening up my client, and it happens, it tells me " Connection Error retrying in 5 seconds"…
And i ran another client, i could login but i disconnect, because its not the correct client.
Because the source need a special client… So its the client somethings wrong with

Any help will be please
[/quote]
I’m not sure but I believe the issue when it says that is if you don’t have the cache or have the incorrect one.[/quote]
WOW THANKS SO MUCH ALOT I CANT DESCRIBE WHAT I FEEL FOR YOU <3 <3 <3 <3
LOVE U SO MUCH

Rep++ If i could!

Read full topic

hmm…508+ source and client? Because this normally happens with 508s

Then im opening up my client, and it happens, it tells me " Connection Error retrying in 5 seconds"…
And i ran another client, i could login but i disconnect, because its not the correct client.
